content: this soft and delicate shawl wraps around your shoulders and keeps you warm on the colder days elegant sophisticated and as light as a feather colourways used are venice and satchel yarn may be substituted with nurturing fibres supertwist sock or any other nurturing fibres lace weight yarns that you have in your stash nb this pattern has been checked and ammended please download the latest version called final designed for h+h 2016
